name: GGJ23: TapRoot
description:
You are on an adventure to find edible roots to bring back home to your home planet. You are accompanied by a magical bottle that can detect these roots as well as enemies nearby. 

What new world there is to discover, how does everything look so familiar? 

Can you find these roots and make your way back to the ship before your family runs out of food. 

This is 1000% Pre-beta.
